revised_title: George Hoole Mitchell: A Biographical Memoir
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of George Hoole Mitchell, a prominent geologist who worked for the Geological Survey of Great Britain. Mitchell made significant contributions to the understanding of the geology of the Lake District, Yorkshire, and the English Midlands. He was also involved in the resurveying of coalfields and played a crucial role in the development of the geological community during his time.
